clues.text: Welcome to the Hunt, **The Scavenger Hunt**. Since this is your first trial, we will keep it simple. *All the clues are in this house*, so let's jump right in. Are you ready?
Welcome to the Hunt, **The Scavenger Hunt**. Since this is your first trial, we will keep it simple. *All the clues are in this house*, so let's jump right in. Are you ready?
The name on the oddest Christmas ornament.
Well well, you made it past your first challenge. Let's see if you can figure this one out. It's not an elf but it's on a shelf.

clues.hint: it has something to do with a cube, or does it?
clues.text: Do you know of a cleaner that can do a low, romantic ballroom dance?

clues.hint: the thing that tells you the date
clues.text: You're right. This is to easy, let's up the difficulty. The date is May 25th.
How would one find an edible color?
